ValidationRule.description: Requires a case category to be entered before CE can transfer a case to the compliance queue
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( $User.Team__c , 'Client Support' ) && Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Compliance' && ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) && ISPICKVAL( Category__c , '' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The case must have a category before transferring to Compliance
